title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When there is no data available for a series, the current behavior does not display a friendly error message to remind users.
OB: When previewing, I observed that there is no friendly error message shown when there is no data available for a series.
EB: When previewing, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind users when there is no data available for a series.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application
2. Go to the series view
3. Observe that there is no data available for a series
4. Verify that there is no friendly error message displayed
